item.title: RT by @Ologies: Thanks to the @Ologies podcast, I have a much better understanding of flies. Yes, they don't belong in the house. But I now know what they do for planet Earth. Thanks to @alieward and @BrytheFlyGuy for a great hour!
item.dc:creator: @mpceccato
item.description: Thanks to the @Ologies podcast, I have a much better understanding of flies. Yes, they don't belong in the house. But I now know what they do for planet Earth. Thanks to @alieward and @BrytheFlyGuy for a great hour!

item.title:
New ep: DO NOT SKIP FLIES. Dr. @BrytheFlyGuy is *the* Dipterologist who can make you appreciate these maligned, mysterious & gorgeous tiny animals.
From metallic rainbow butts to sawblade faces, they will maggot their way into your heart. You'll see.
https://www.alieward.com/ologies/dipterology
item.dc:creator: @Ologies
item.description:
New ep: DO NOT SKIP FLIES. Dr. @BrytheFlyGuy is *the* Dipterologist who can make you appreciate these maligned, mysterious & gorgeous tiny animals.

From metallic rainbow butts to sawblade faces, they will maggot their way into your heart. You'll see.

alieward.com/ologies/diptero‚Ä¶
